name: MTN Trek
description:
You're a sphynx cat on your way to your friend's cabin in the mountains in desperate need of warmer clothes. Luckily, there are plenty of friendly locals happy to lend you some.

A short sidescroller about a cat's hike through the mountains and its search for clothes, made for My First Game Jam Winter 17!

Music:

Inner Light Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
